use_case.title: View/Administer a single participant
use_case.description: A Portal Participant wishes to view various information about a specific portal participant. A Portal Administrator may also want to perform various other administrative tasks on a participant.

trigger.value: A Portal Participant wishes to view various information about a specific portal participant, or a Portal Administrator wishes to perform administrative actions related to a specific participant

use_case.basic_path:
1. The Portal Participant locates the participant they are interested in via PSRV-00051:Search for a portal participant.
  2. The Participant clicks on a "view" link next to the name of the participant of interest.
  3. The resulting view page presents the Participant with a history of the selected participant as well as their other activities, and also various other information specific to the selected participant, such as their role assignments in the portal. In addition, this view will present data on the user that is not associated with any portal, such as position in the organization structure and contact information.
use_case.success_end_conditions: The user is able to view listings of participants within the portal, and drill down to detailed views of individual participants.
use_case.alternative_paths: • When viewed by an Administrator, this page will also serve as a participant administration page: UI will be provided for adjusting their role assignments (See PSRV-00065), for removing the participant from the portal (See PSRV-00056), and for any other administrative tasks that are identified.
